# Welcome to Symphony Radio v1.0.0! üéâ

We're thrilled to welcome you to the official launch of Symphony Radio! This release includes a comprehensive set of features designed to create an amazing music and community experience.

## üéµ Core Features

### Music & Radio
- **Live Radio Streaming**: Enjoy continuous music streaming with real-time DJ interactions
- **Song Library**: Browse and discover thousands of songs with detailed information
- **Top 5 Songs**: Personalize your profile with your favorite tracks
- **Song Search**: Powerful search functionality with database and external API integration (Spotify, iTunes)
- **Song Pages**: Dedicated pages for each song with artwork, ratings, and comments

### User Profiles & Social
- **Rich User Profiles**: Customizable profiles with biography, social links, and visitor messages
- **Profile Pictures**: Upload and crop your avatar with advanced image editing tools
- **User Cosmetics**: Customize your appearance with avatar shimmers and name colors
- **Visitor Messages**: Leave messages on user profiles with replies and mentions
- **Recent Visitors**: See who's been checking out your profile
- **Achievements System**: Track and display your accomplishments
- **Pronouns Support**: Display your preferred pronouns on your profile

### Direct Messaging
- **Real-time DMs**: Private messaging system with conversation management
- **Image Sharing**: Send pictures in direct messages
- **Message Mentions**: Mention users in messages with rich user chips
- **Unread Indicators**: Never miss a message with unread count badges
- **Conversation Sidebar**: Easy navigation between conversations

### Content & Community
- **Content Library**: Browse articles, news, and updates with category filtering
- **Search Functionality**: Search across songs, users, and content
- **Comments & Replies**: Engage with content through threaded comments
- **Live Chat**: Real-time community chat with mentions support
- **Team Page**: Discover the team behind Symphony Radio

### Notifications
- **Comprehensive Notifications**: Stay updated with mentions, messages, follows, and more
- **Notification Management**: Mark as read, delete, and manage your notifications
- **Mention Notifications**: Get notified when someone mentions you (except in DMs)

### Privacy & Settings
- **Privacy Controls**: Hide followers, following lists, and visitor messages
- **Profile Customization**: Center biography text, customize appearance
- **Account Settings**: Manage your profile, privacy, and preferences

## üé® User Experience

### Design & Interface
- **Modern Glass Morphism**: Beautiful glass-effect UI throughout the application
- **Responsive Design**: Seamless experience on desktop, tablet, and mobile
- **Mobile Navigation**: Optimized bottom navigation for mobile devices
- **Dark Theme**: Easy on the eyes with a beautiful dark color scheme
- **Smooth Animations**: Polished transitions and animations using Framer Motion

### Accessibility & Performance
- **Fast Loading**: Optimized data fetching and caching
- **User Hover Cards**: Quick user previews without leaving the page
- **Image Optimization**: Efficient image handling and lazy loading
- **Real-time Updates**: Live updates for online users and activity

## üõ†Ô∏è Technical Features

- **Next.js 14**: Built with the latest Next.js framework
- **TypeScript**: Full type safety throughout the application
- **Database Integration**: MySQL database with Drizzle ORM
- **Authentication**: Secure session-based authentication
- **API Routes**: RESTful API architecture
- **Markdown Support**: Rich text formatting with markdown rendering
- **Version Control**: Built-in version tracking and changelog system

## üéØ What's Next?

We're constantly working on improvements and new features. Stay tuned for:
- More customization options
- Enhanced social features
- Performance optimizations
- And much more!

## üôè Thank You

Thank you for being part of the Symphony Radio community! We hope you enjoy your experience and look forward to your feedback.
